title: What's your reason for being in elo hell?
body:
http://i.imgur.com/iAs60dV.gif

Give me a new perspective. Tell me exactly why you're in elo hell and why you can't climb your way out. I  want specific examples, not 'oh I'm surrounded by trolls and feeders,' because everyone in the game is surrounded by trolls and feeders. It's part of the game. 

There are always conquerors and those who are conquered.

So tell me GD, why are you in elo hell?
